text: 4:8 Aghuzir Akaba 10:12; 1 Korin 13:7; Kolosi 3:14; Hibru 13:1; Jems 5:20; 1 Pita 1:22Nɨ igharaz tav gifueghtɨ, an arazir kuratam nɨ damightɨ, nɨ zuamɨra an arazir kurar kam gɨn amadagham. Kamaghɨn ia Kraisɨn adarasi, uan navir averiabar uarira uarigh ifongegh. Arazir kam an araziba bar dagh afira.
